monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Assault Shield
skills.description: Shield by 30% of the damage dealt to enemies by critical hits. Increases critical chance by 7%.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Augmented Shielding
skills.description: Every shield that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 7.5% chance to apply a random Buff.

skills.name: Brawler
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, gain Might (Buff) and shield self by 75% of this monster's Attack value.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Buffing Restore
skills.description: When applying a Buff, 50% chance that a Debuff is removed.

skills.name: Chilling Wind
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Combo Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 30% of Magic value.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Boon
skills.description: On Critical Hit, 50% chance to grant a random Buff to another random Monster in the party.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Critical Sorcery
skills.description: Unique Aura: Sorcery also increases the critical chance by 6%.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Exploit Party
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party exploits an enemy's weakness with an attack, it gains a random Buff and shields by 5% of its Max Health.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Flurry of Blows
skills.description: 2 x 65% (130%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 85% (170%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Flurry of Blows Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Freeze
skills.description: 5 x 30% (150%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freeze Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (water) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Freezing Punches
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Freezing Punches Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (water)

skills.name: Frost Pierce
skills.description: 8 x 65% (520%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +75% every hit has a 15% chance to apply Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Life Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (300 + 7.5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 5% Max Health)

skills.name: Life Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (500 + 6% Max Health)

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 21. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mega Restore
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (250 + 40% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Might
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Multi Might
skills.description: Aura: Might (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Sorcery
skills.description: Aura: Sorcery (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Polar Winds
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Chill (Debuff) - Heal all allies for (700 + 120% Magic)

skills.name: Power
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Power Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might (Buff) to whole party Applies Sorcery (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Power Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might & Sorcery (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Shared Might
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Might (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Might.

skills.name: Shared Sorcery
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Sorcery (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Sorcery.

skills.name: Shield Crush
skills.description: Unique Aura: Might also increases damage done against shielded enemies by 25%.

skills.name: Situational Support
skills.description: When this Monster uses a non-damaging action for the first time in combat, apply a random Buff on all allies and shield them by 20% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Snow Veil
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Snow Veil Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Snow Veil Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Sorcerer
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, gain Sorcery (Buff) and shield self by 75% of this monster's Magic value.

skills.name: Stampede
skills.description: Aura: When a Beast Monster in your party attacks, it deals 10% more damage for each other Beast Monster that acted before it during that turn.

skills.name: Stone Rain
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (earth)
